00018 Component* CompoundRenderableCreator::copyComponent(const string& name, Component* com)
00019 {
00020     CompoundRenderable* compound = static_cast<CompoundRenderable*>(com);
00021 
00022     CompoundRenderable* copy = new CompoundRenderable(name);
00023 
00024     const list<Renderable*> renderables = compound->getAttachedRenderables();
00025     list<Renderable*>::const_iterator iter;
00026     for (iter = renderables.begin(); iter != renderables.end(); ++iter)
00027         copy->addRenderable(*iter);
00028     return copy;
00029 }
